body_html:
The real PRs are very close and I think some people have used those to get things working as well. Just an FYI. When they are all approved I will update and close this issue. Dominik is correct you have to build (then fail) then do the Eigen step then build again.
…
On Wed, Aug 30, 2017 at 12:16 PM, Dominik Schlösser < ***@***.***> wrote: You need to try to build tf once. That pulls the external dependencies like eigen3. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
The real PRs are very close and I think some people have used those to get
things working as well.  Just an FYI. When they are all approved I will
update and close this issue.  Dominik is correct you have to build (then
fail) then do the Eigen step then build again.

On Wed, Aug 30, 2017 at 12:16 PM, Dominik Schlösser <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> You need to try to build tf once. That pulls the external dependencies
> like eigen3.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
